info.name: Heroes of Phandalin
info.description: Items discovered by the Heroes of Phandalin on their adventures.
info.author: Chris New

description.p: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the burning hands spell from it. For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
The mighty Axe of Testing consists of nothing but a strange collection of bleeps and bloops.
